node.statement: Step 1.1.3 (U_q(su(2)) covariance): The q-supercharge Q_q transforms as a scalar under U_q(su(2)), i.e., [J_q^+, Q_q] = [J_q^-, Q_q] = [J_q^3, Q_q] = 0, where J_q^{+,-,3} are the generators of U_q(su(2)) acting on the fermion Fock space. This follows from the Wigner-Eckart theorem for quantum groups: the quantum 3j symbol with j1=j2=j3=j couples three spin-j representations to the trivial (spin-0) representation.
